evs.metric.metrics
Interface BootstrapableMetric

All Known Implementing Classes:
BrierScore, BrierSkillScore, Correlation, MeanAbsoluteError, MeanCaptureRateDiagram, MeanContRankProbScore, MeanContRankProbSkillScore, MeanError, MeanErrorOfProbabilityDiagram, RankHistogram, RelativeMeanError, RelativeOperatingCharacteristic, ReliabilityDiagram, ROCScore, RootMeanSquareError, SingleValuedQQPlot, SpreadBiasDiagram
public interface BootstrapableMetric

Identifies a metric that may be bootstrapped, in order to assess its uncertainty when computed from a limited sample of verification pairs. Metrics that implement this interface should store the bootstrap parameter together with the other parameters of the metric, as this will encourage proper handling when creating copies of the metric.

Version:
4.0
Author:
evs@hydrosolved.com

Constant Field Values

STATIONARY_BLOCK_BOOTSTRAP

static final int STATIONARY_BLOCK_BOOTSTRAP
Identifier for the stationary block bootstrap algorithm, which obtains a bootstrap resample from a moving window of variable block length centered on a particular verification pair. The block length is a random variable, with values to be sampled from a probability distribution.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

STATIONARY_BLOCK_BOOTSTRAP_STRING

static final java.lang.String STATIONARY_BLOCK_BOOTSTRAP_STRING
String identifier for stationary block bootstrap.

See Also:
